_sText:
MAP MADE BY PIMP JUICE
*********************

Spawns: 20 T 20 CT
Jails: 5
Shot4shot? Yes, I made this unique idea on the roof. Check for your self :D
Gun toss? Yes
Basket ball game? Yes *This one, I made myself. The task is to throw a deagle in the net by standing on the white line. Jumping is allowed. Both have 1 try each, if both miss, repeat untill 1 hits and the other 1 misses. The one who fails dies.
Race? No
Knife/chicken fight? No, but can do anywhere in the map.

Screenshots:
1. T spawn
2. View from above 1
3. View from above 2

This is my first map ever, and specially hosties map. I decided to make one because Ilike the new hosties mod and want to see my map on aswell ;)

There is a wall where CT can check T for weapon.
I made 2 small secrets and 1 big. 
1.The 2 small is that you can break the wall in the first and second jail to connect with each other.
2.The second is that if you stand on the toilet in jail 5, the wall will break after 1min and you can escape.
3. I wont tell you this secret, you will have to find it yourself. Its pretty useful for both T and CT

I hope you enjoy playing my first map!
//Pimp Juice
Heres a vid, the first part is the map
